name: Mavuika
title: "Night-Igniting Flame" Mavuika
desc: The brightest, most splendid, most resplendent flame reborn.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Mavuika to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: The Named Moment
skills.desc: This character enters Nightsoul's Blessing and gains 2 Nightsoul points. Select 1 card from 3 Flamestrider cards to add to your Hand.

skills.name: Hour of Burning Skies
skills.desc:
This character enters Nightsoul's Blessing, gains 1 Nightsoul point, and consumes all of their Fighting Spirit. They then deal ? to the opponent's active character equal to the Fighting Spirit consumed.
If 6 points of Fighting Spirit are consumed, attach Crucible of Death and Life to this character.

skills.name: Fighting Spirit
skills.desc:
This character cannot gain Energy.
Each time your characters consume Nightsoul points or use Normal Attacks, gain 1 Fighting Spirit.
When this character uses an Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, attach All-Fire Armaments: Ring of Searing Radiance.
